description.lang: The 2 ports smart plug provides one Z-Wave outlet for remote controlled by controller through Z-Wave gateway for internet of thing service and can be configured in Z-Wave sensor network, if Z-Wave certified controller features remote access, you can now control your device from your mobile phone devices. the other outlet will be manual On/Off by push button on front. The outlets have maximum load for 600W Incandescent,HP motor or 1200W resistive.
